column17:
With Singer Popup Toaster you can make a healthy and tasty breakfast easily. It has an automatic popup that prevents toasts from burning and an electronic variable browning control for preferred toast colour. It comes with 750W power consumption.Features

  • Category: Appliances
  • Product Type: Popup Toaster
  • Colour: White
  • Functions: Toasting Defrost Reheat
  • No. Of Slices: 2
  • Automatic Popup: Yes
  • Power: 1400W
  • Defrost setting: Yes
  • Anti Burn Feature: Yes
  • Slide out crumb tray: Yes
  • Electronic Variable Browning Control: Yes
  • Cool touch body: Yes
